main event: An observer reported seeing a glowing white object larger than a silver dollar in Cleveland, Ohio on May 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared to have an irregular outline and was at a high altitude., It was observed for 12 minutes without any sound., The observer believes in UFOs and suspects a base in the Ozark Mountains near St. Louis., There were reports of unusual activity in the area., The object disappeared below the horizon.
sighted object: a glowing white object larger than a silver dollar
witness description: The observer is a reliable and scientific-minded aerial observer who firmly believes in UFOs.
